A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Might not be the best of the franchise but SW:TLJ definitely a damn good Star Wars movie. It doesn't hesitate to take the lore/saga to a new route. It also showcased one of the best Luke and Leia moments and how bad-ass the Skywalkers are. In the end\, SW8 never disappoints me and brings a new flavor to the saga.
